CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C03

TITLE.P: Amplify — Business Escalator Programme for Mid and East Antrim Borough Council

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Amplify Business Escalator Programme will be Mid and East Antrim Borough Council’s principal business support and growth programme. The programme will be the first point of contact for businesses located in Mid and East Antrim Borough. The programme will centralise all local business support and will co-ordinate local stakeholder support by providing both specialist advice and signposting businesses to relevant support, simplifying the marketplace for businesses and to avoid duplication of support activity. The programme will also provide demand led tailored, specialist business mentor support to micro and small enterprises, where existing supports cannot assist them. Therefore, tenderers should note that business mentoring requests will be based on the demand for particular support requirements identified for each business by the Business Client Manager within Council.

Therefore, tenderers should note that business mentoring requests will be based on the demand for particular support requirements identified for each business by the Business Client Manager within Council.
